summary: This is an arrest warrant issued by a U.S. Magistrate Judge for Ghislaine Maxwell, commanding law enforcement to arrest her for charges including conspiracy to entice minors, enticement of a minor, conspiracy to transport minors, transportation of a minor, and perjury. The warrant was issued in White Plains, New York.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The individual named in the arrest warrant, accused of multiple federal offenses related to the enticement and transportation of minors, and perjury.

persons.name: Lisa Margaret Smith
persons.context: The issuing officer who signed the arrest warrant for Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Arrest Warrant Issued for Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: A U.S. Magistrate Judge issued an arrest warrant for Ghislaine Maxwell on federal charges including conspiracy to entice minors, enticement of a minor, conspiracy to transport minors, transportation of a minor, and perjury.

keyFacts: An arrest warrant was issued for Ghislaine Maxwell on June 29, 2019.
The warrant lists federal charges under Title 18, U.S. Code, including conspiracy to entice minors, enticement of a minor, conspiracy to transport minors, transportation of a minor, and perjury.
The warrant was issued by U.S. Magistrate Judge Lisa Margaret Smith in White Plains, New York.
